    • Uses of NiftyMutableColor in de.lessvoid.nifty.types

      Methods in de.lessvoid.nifty.types that return NiftyMutableColor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static NiftyMutableColor NiftyMutableColor.fromColor(NiftyColor color)
      Create a new NiftyMutableColor from an existing NiftyColor.
      NiftyMutableColor NiftyMutableColor.linear(NiftyColor start, NiftyColor end, double t)
      Linear interpolate between the start color and the end color using the given t which needs to be in [0, 1]
      NiftyMutableColor NiftyMutableColor.mutiply(double factor)
      Multiply all of the color components by the given factor.
      NiftyMutableColor NiftyMutableColor.set(NiftyColor color)
      Change all components of this to values from the given color.
      NiftyMutableColor NiftyMutableColor.setAlpha(double newColorAlpha)
      Set alpha component.
      NiftyMutableColor NiftyMutableColor.setBlue(double newBlue)
      Set blue component.
      NiftyMutableColor NiftyMutableColor.setGreen(double newGreen)
      Set green component.
      NiftyMutableColor NiftyMutableColor.setRed(double newRed)
      Set red component.
      NiftyMutableColor NiftyMutableColor.update(NiftyColor src)
      Update all of the components of this color with the components of another NiftyColor.
